New Records: Aiden Markram scored 91 runs, the highest for South Africa in the match
Usama Mir made a crucial contribution as a concussion substitute
Key Match Events: Markram held his nerve to take the team close
Usama Mir dismissed key South African batsmen
Tabraiz Shamsi was player of the match
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan struck back with timely wickets
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa's captain Temba Bavuma expressed relief and happiness
Pakistan team director Mickey Arthur warned against a 'witch-hunt'
Babar Azam reflected on the missed opportunity
Miscellaneous Highlights: Arthur emphasized the players' effort and dedication
Others: The match was played at the MA Chidambaram Stadium
South Africa's victory moved them closer to the semifinals
